about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Bewitched Garden Set - Halloween 2022] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
  • Pallbearer’s Prints
  • Pine Trees
  • Cemetery Gate
  • Zombie Vines
  • Funeral Flowers
  • Skeleton Hands
  • Witch’s Altar

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
